name: Street Run
description:
How is the game?

     Street Run is a merge between runner and quiz games. The goal is to reach the your maximum highscore while unlocking characters with coins and answers.

Why you created it?

    This games was created by me when I was on the last year of school. We had to do a project similar to CBT, and I choose to report a game development process. The only objective with this game is to gain experience and learn.
